title: Is paying fees to access a portal where I can make bookings & people pay me commission, halal? assim
transcript: um I have a question about an online business so uh how this is how it's done um I will be paying 500 pesos and then after paying I get an access to the portal and then once I get an access to the portal I will be able to um book flights um domestic and international um is this online business Halal so so you're telling me that to access the portal which would enable you to facilitate bookings for others and they will pay you your commission is this is what's going on if the portal is legitimate and you're getting this as a membership fee there is no problem in that inshallah and Allah Knows Best
